name: Michael J. Zoidl
what_is_my_connection_to_javascript: It's my daily business since more than three years, from pure node projects to big interface projects with react and redux under the hood. JS is life, JS is love.
what_can_i_contribute: Wanna talk about deploying a node project with zero-downtime on digital-ocean or working with rethinkdb hosted on compose.io? 'Come to me my friend.
